description: ISLAMABAD – Pakistani government on Sunday increased price of petrol by Rs9.66 for April 2024. description: PESHAWAR – Parts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa including Peshawar received scattered rain, making weather pleasant by decreasing the temperatures. title: Wet spell decreases temperatures in Peshawar, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa

description: ISLAMABAD – Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has expressed the desire to work with the United States to achieve the goals of global and regional peace, stability, progress and prosperity. description: ISLAMABAD – Parts of Pakistan including Islamabad and Rawalpindi received rainfall of varying intensities during the last 24 hours, making weather pleasant by causing a considerable decrease in the mercury level. title: Islamabad, Rawalpindi weather update; rain decreases temperatures

description: ISLAMABAD – The pollen count reached 4,419 per cubic meter of air in Islamabad on Sunday, still posing a threat to the health of allergy patients even after a considerable decrease in intensity due to the recent wet spell. As per the data released by the Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD), the total pollen count is […]
title: Pollen count still high in Islamabad even after intermittent rains
